channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 根据 CoreLogic NZ 的数据，2 月份新西兰住房市场延续了今年开局的疲软态势，价格涨幅连续第二个月放缓。
item.description:
New Zealand’s housing market continued its soft start to the year in February, with price gains slowing for a second straight month, according to CoreLogic NZ. https://t.co/rU2SiBaaHA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 柯达正考虑采取行动，以释放因养老金系统资金过剩而产生的收益
item.description:
Kodak is contemplating a move to unlock gains created by its overfunded pension system https://t.co/XYgPinjNMs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 波兰总理唐纳德-图斯克（Donald Tusk）表示，他将推动欧盟气候议程的变革，以减轻波兰农民的负担
item.description:
Polish Prime Minister Donald Tusk said he’ll push for changes to the European Union’s climate agenda to take the burden off the country’s farmers https://t.co/puIdRKDG3R

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 众议院通过临时拨款法案以避免美国政府周六部分关门，并将该法案送交参议院
item.description:
The House passed a temporary funding bill to avert a Saturday partial US government shutdown, sending the bill to the Senate https://t.co/2AU5STeVeO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 据美国能源信息署（Energy Information Administration）称，美国的石油需求在 2023 年飙升至四年来的最高点，预计到 2024 年将保持在这一水平附近。
item.description:
Oil demand in the US surged to a four-year high in 2023 and is expected to hold near that level through 2024, according to the Energy Information Administration https://t.co/5AjemjiBLN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 葡萄牙财政部长费尔南多-梅迪纳敦促欧洲央行开始降低借贷成本，称将借贷成本维持在当前水平是一种 "高风险"。
item.description:
Portuguese Finance Minister Fernando Medina urges the ECB to start lowering borrowing costs, saying maintaining them at their current level is a “high risk” https://t.co/y9uU59D1kk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚房价在 2 月份加速上涨，在利率高企的情况下扩大了涨幅，反映了人口增长的激增和新住房建设的匮乏。
item.description:
Australian home prices accelerated in February, extending gains at a time of elevated interest rates, reflecting a spike in population growth and a dearth of new housing construction. https://t.co/GTwpc6cRmT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 战神管理公司（Ares Management）与总部位于悉尼的 Pallas Capital 合作成立了一个 5 亿澳元的基金，为缺乏银行资金的商业地产公司提供流动资金。
item.description:
Ares Management has teamed up with Sydney-based Pallas Capital for an A$500 million fund that will provide liquidity to commercial real estate firms who lack bank funding. https://t.co/1BeLYUoNIs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 美国太空司令部负责人表示，中国正在以 "惊人的速度 "发展太空军事能力，以对抗美国的在轨卫星

item.title: EQT 北美私募股权投资主管 Eric Liu 认为，整个股票市场还没有准备好在首次公开募股开始交易后为其提供支持。

item.title: 在英格兰西北部的罗奇代尔（Rochdale），今天的补选中出现了一份奇怪的候选人名单，主要围绕着 2000 多英里外的一场冲突展开。与@Hariboconomics一起了解选举信息
item.description:
In Rochdale in the northwest of England, today’s by-election features a bizarre list of candidates and has largely centered around a conflict more than 2,000 miles away. Get the Readout with @Hariboconomics https://t.co/c24xA1BBIe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024
